page.title: 14Health Care
page.content: The doctors' practice in the town is situated at the Health Centre in Cheshire Street.They look after 14500 patients in a 5 mile radius of the town.Six doctors work 4 and a half days each week and are on call 1 night in six and 1 Saturday and 1 Sunday in every six.They visit patients at home, more patients are visited in Winter than in Summer.They also visit the nearby army camp for sick parade.Each doctor holds a one and a half hour surgery each morning and afternoon.There are clinics at the centre for well babies, Antenetal Care, Diabetic Clinic and well women. A Psychiatrist visits twice a month, and a Chiropodist visits weekly.At the centre there are 8 receptionists working shifts,4 health visitors, 5 District Nurses and 3 practice Nurses always available in surgery hours.
